name: Assault Roll
tooltip:
Rolls away from a threat, dodging all attacks and gaining a major attack speed increase for next <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerRoll_ASBuffStacksApplier.stacks"/> attacks. These attack will also briefly stun light enemies.

The effect expires in <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerRoll_ASBuffStacks.duration"/> seconds if not used up.
